00023 #include "stats/statfun.h"
00024 //
00025 #include <cstdlib>
00026 #include <fstream>
00027 #include <iostream>

00029 
00030 using namespace std;
00031 
00032 #define TOLERANCE 1e-6  // currently this is the limit of accuracy for pnorm(), it could be made more accurate.
00033 #define MAX_LINE_LEN 1024
00034 #define PNORM_FILE "test_data/pnorm.tab"
00035 #define PWILCOX_FILE "test_data/pwilcox.tab"
00036 #define PSIGNRANK_FILE "test_data/psignrank.tab"
00037 #define SIGNED_RANK_TEST_FILE "test_data/signrank_test.tab"
00038 #define RANK_SUM_TEST_FILE "test_data/ranksum_test.tab"
00039 
00040 int test_pnorm(void);
00041 int test_psignrank(void);
00042 int test_pwilcox(void);
00043 int test_signedRankTest(void);
00044 int test_ranksumTest(void);
00045 
00046 int main(int argc, char *argv[]) {
00047   int exit_status = EXIT_SUCCESS;
00048 
00049   if(test_pnorm()==EXIT_FAILURE)
00050     exit_status = EXIT_FAILURE;
00051 
00052   if(test_psignrank()==EXIT_FAILURE)
00053     exit_status = EXIT_FAILURE;
00054 
00055   if(test_signedRankTest()==EXIT_FAILURE)
00056     exit_status = EXIT_FAILURE;
00057 
00058   if(test_pwilcox()==EXIT_FAILURE)
00059     exit_status = EXIT_FAILURE;
00060 
00061   if(test_ranksumTest()==EXIT_FAILURE)
00062     exit_status = EXIT_FAILURE;
00063 
00064   exit(exit_status);
00065 }
00066 
00067 // Test pnorm
00068 int test_pnorm(void) {
00069   int exit_status = EXIT_SUCCESS;
00070 
00071   float x,val,ref,error;
00072   ifstream pnormFile(PNORM_FILE,ios_base::in);
00073   int lineNo=0;
00074   float max_error=0;
00075   char line[MAX_LINE_LEN];
00076   while(pnormFile.getline(line,MAX_LINE_LEN)) {
00077     lineNo++;
00078     if(2 != sscanf(line,"%f\t%f",&x,&ref)) {
00079       fprintf(stderr,"bad input in line %d of %s\n",lineNo,PNORM_FILE);
00080       exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00081     }
00082     val = affxstat::pnorm(x,0,1,1,0);
00083     error = fabs(val-ref);
00084     if(error > TOLERANCE) {
00085       printf("error of size %.10f for pnorm(%f), got %.10f, should be %.10f\n",fabs(ref-val),x,val,ref);
00086       exit_status = EXIT_FAILURE;
00087     }
00088     if(error > max_error)
00089       max_error = error;
00090   }
00091   pnormFile.close();
00092   printf("Maximum observed error for pnorm() is %.10f\n",max_error);
00093 
00094   return(exit_status);
00095 }
00096

00098 // Test psignrank
00099 int test_psignrank(void) {
00100   int exit_status = EXIT_SUCCESS;
00101 
00102   float val,ref,error;
00103   unsigned int n,t;
00104   ifstream psignrankFile(PSIGNRANK_FILE);
00105   int lineNo=0;
00106   float max_error=0;
00107   char line[MAX_LINE_LEN];
00108   while(psignrankFile.getline(line,MAX_LINE_LEN)) {
00109     lineNo++;
00110     if(3 != sscanf(line,"%u\t%u\t%f",&n,&t,&ref)) {
00111       fprintf(stderr,"bad input in line %d of %s\n",lineNo,PSIGNRANK_FILE);
00112       exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00113     }
00114     val = affxstat::psignrank(t,n,true,false);
00115     error = fabs(val-ref);
00116     if(error > TOLERANCE) {
00117       printf("error of size %.10f for psignrank(%u,%u), got %.10f, should be %.10f\n",error,t,n,val,ref);
00118       exit_status = EXIT_FAILURE;
00119     }
00120     if(error > max_error)
00121       max_error = error;
00122   }
00123   psignrankFile.close();
00124   printf("Maximum observed error for psignrank() is %.10f\n",max_error);
00125 
00126   return(exit_status);
00127 }

00129 // Test pwilcox
00130 int test_pwilcox(void) {
00131   int exit_status = EXIT_SUCCESS;
00132 
00133   float val,ref,error;
00134   unsigned int m,n,x;
00135   ifstream pwilcoxFile(PWILCOX_FILE);
00136   int lineNo=0;
00137   float max_error=0;
00138   char line[MAX_LINE_LEN];
00139   while(pwilcoxFile.getline(line,MAX_LINE_LEN)) {
00140     lineNo++;
00141     if(4 != sscanf(line,"%u\t%u\t%u\t%f",&m,&n,&x,&ref)) {
00142       fprintf(stderr,"bad input in line %d of %s\n",lineNo,PWILCOX_FILE);
00143       exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00144     }
00145     val = affxstat::pwilcox(x,m,n,true,false);
00146     error = fabs(val-ref);
00147     if(error > TOLERANCE) {
00148       printf("error of size %.10f for pwilcox(%u,%u,%u), got %.10f, should be %.10f\n",fabs(ref-val),x,m,n,val,ref);
00149       exit_status = EXIT_FAILURE;
00150     }
00151     if(error > max_error)
00152       max_error = error;
00153   }
00154   pwilcoxFile.close();
00155   printf("Maximum observed error for pwilcox() is %.10f\n",max_error);
00156 
00157   return(exit_status);
00158 }

00160 // Test signedRankTest
00161 int test_signedRankTest(void) {
00162   int exit_status = EXIT_SUCCESS;
00163 
00164   float val,ref,error;
00165   unsigned int n;
00166   ifstream inFile(SIGNED_RANK_TEST_FILE);
00167   int lineNo=0;
00168   int tailType;
00169   float max_error=0;
00170   while(!inFile.eof()) {
00171     lineNo++;
00172     inFile >> ref >> tailType >> n;
00173     if(inFile.fail())
00174       break;
00175     double *x = new double[n];
00176     for(unsigned int i=0; i<n; i++)
00177       inFile >> x[i];
00178 
00179     // Check p-value on linear scale
00180     val = affxstat::signedRankTest(x,n,tailType,false);
00181     error = fabs(val-ref);
00182     if(error > TOLERANCE) {
00183       printf("error of size %.10f for signedRankTest on line %d of %s, got %.10f, should be %.10f\n",error,lineNo,SIGNED_RANK_TEST_FILE,val,ref);
00184       exit_status = EXIT_FAILURE;
00185     }
00186     if(error > max_error)
00187       max_error = error;
00188 
00189     // Check p-value on log scale
00190     val = exp(affxstat::signedRankTest(x,n,tailType,true));
00191     error = fabs(val-ref);
00192     if(error > TOLERANCE) {
00193       printf("error of size %.10f for signedRankTest on line %d of %s (logged pvalue), got %.10f, should be %.10f\n",error,lineNo,SIGNED_RANK_TEST_FILE,val,ref);
00194       exit_status = EXIT_FAILURE;
00195     }
00196     if(error > max_error)
00197       max_error = error;
00198     
00199     delete[] x;
00200   }
00201   inFile.close();
00202   printf("Maximum observed error for signedRankTest() is %.10f\n",max_error);
00203 
00204   return(exit_status);
00205 }
00206 
00207 // Test rank sum test
00208 int test_ranksumTest(void) {
00209   int exit_status = EXIT_SUCCESS;
00210 
00211   float val,ref,error;
00212   unsigned int n,m;
00213   ifstream inFile(RANK_SUM_TEST_FILE);
00214   int lineNo=0;
00215   int tailType;
00216   float max_error=0;
00217   while(!inFile.eof()) {
00218     lineNo++;
00219     inFile >> ref >> tailType >> n >> m;
00220     if(inFile.fail())
00221       break;
00222     double *x = new double[n];
00223     double *y = new double[m];
00224     for(unsigned int i=0; i<n; i++)
00225       inFile >> x[i];
00226     for(unsigned int i=0; i<m; i++)
00227       inFile >> y[i];
00228 
00229     // test on linear pvalue
00230     val = affxstat::ranksumTest(x,n,y,m,tailType,false);
00231     error = fabs(val-ref);
00232     if(error > TOLERANCE) {
00233       printf("error of size %.10f for ranksumTest on line %d of %s, got %.10f, should be %.10f\n",error,lineNo,RANK_SUM_TEST_FILE,val,ref);
00234       exit_status = EXIT_FAILURE;
00235     }
00236     if(error > max_error)
00237       max_error = error;
00238 
00239     // test on logged pvalue
00240     val = exp(affxstat::ranksumTest(x,n,y,m,tailType,true));
00241     error = fabs(val-ref);
00242     if(error > TOLERANCE) {
00243       printf("error of size %.10f for ranksumTest on line %d of %s (logged version), got %.10f, should be %.10f\n",error,lineNo,RANK_SUM_TEST_FILE,val,ref);
00244       exit_status = EXIT_FAILURE;
00245     }
00246     if(error > max_error)
00247       max_error = error;
00248 
00249     delete[] x;
00250     delete[] y;
00251   }
00252   inFile.close();
00253   printf("Maximum observed error for ranksumTest() is %.10f\n",max_error);
00254 
00255   return(exit_status);
00256 }
